indicator_name: Proportion of adults (15 years and older) with an account at a bank or other financial institution or with a mobile-money-service provider
SDG_GOAL: Goal 8: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
SDG_TARGET: Target 8.10: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 8.10.2: Proportion of family units with a chequing or savings account
STAT_CONC_DEF: This indicator measures the percentage of family units (economic families or individuals outside economic families) holding a checking or savings account, whether the balance is positive, negative or zero.
DATA_COMP: Data were tabulated to report on this indicator as specified by the metadata. Please refer to the sources to access additional information on the metadata or source.
REC_USE_LIM: This is a proxy indicator. The UN Global indicator states: "Proportion of adults (15 years and older) with an account at a bank or other financial institution or with a mobile-money-service provider".

fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 8.10.2 : Proportion des unités familiales ayant un compte de chèques ou d'épargne
fr.STAT_CONC_DEF: Cet indicateur mesure le pourcentage d'unités familiales (familles économiques ou individus hors familles économiques) détenant un compte de chèques ou un compte d'épargne, que le solde soit positif, négatif ou nul.

fr.REC_USE_LIM: Il s’agit d’un indicateur de substitution. L’indicateur global des Nations Unies indique: « Proportion d’adultes (15 ans ou plus) possédant un compte dans une banque ou dans une autre institution financière ou faisant appel à des services monétaires mobiles ».
